mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOVEL_POST(n_num, N_POST_NUM, N_POST_TITLE, N_POST_CONTENT, N_POST_LIKE, N_POST_DISLIKE, N_POST_VIEWCOUNT, N_POST_TIME) VALUES(#{n_num}, N_POST_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{N_POST_TITLE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{N_POST_CONTENT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{N_POST_LIKE, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{N_POST_DISLIKE, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{N_POST_VIEWCOUNT, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOVEL_POST SET N_POST_VIEWCOUNT=N_POST_VIEWCOUNT+1 WHERE n_post_num=#{n_post_num}
UPDATE NOVEL_POST SET N_POST_TITLE=#{N_POST_TITLE}, N_POST_CONTENT=#{N_POST_CONTENT} WHERE n_post_num=#{n_POST_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT n_num FROM NOVEL_POST WHERE n_post_num=#{n_post_num}
SELECT m_num FROM NOVEL_HOME WHERE n_num=#{n_num}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM "COMMENT" ORDER BY n_post_num DESC, comment_num) a) b WHERE b.rnum >=#{startRow} AND b.rnum <=#{endRow} AND n_post_num=#{n_post_num} ORDER BY comment_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "COMMENT"(comment_num, m_num, comment_content, comment_time, n_post_num) VALUES(comment_num_SEQ.nextval, #{m_num, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{comment_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{n_post_num, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
